text.front:
COMMENTS AND RESPONSES
Response to
Comment on:
Wheeler et al.
Macronutrients, Food
Groups, and Eating
Patterns in the
Management of
Diabetes: A
Systematic Review of
the Literature, 2010.
Diabetes Care
2012;35:434-445
MADELYN L. WHEELER, MS, RD, FADA, CD 1
STEPHANIE A. DUNBAR, MPH, RD 2
LINDSAY M. JAACKS, BS >3
